title: 3 and Out - Cam vs. Mac Decision, Eagles Outlook, Jamal Adams Deal Reaction, Kill Hard Knocks, NFL News & Notes, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Cam vs. Mac Decision, Eagles Outlook, Jamal Adams Deal Reaction, Kill Hard Knocks, NFL News & Notes, Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John looks at Cam Newton's impressive performance against Philly, if he should start over Mac Jones in week 1, if the Eagles can come back after two down seasons, and his take on the Seahawks deciding to extend Jamal Adams instead of franchise tagging him. He also looks at some interesting news and notes from around the league - including why Hard Knocks is irrelevant in 2021, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
